appDesc.message: Make better Wattpad interface on desktop (just somes tricks, but incredibly convenient). Fully configurable
appDesc.description: Make better Wattpad interface on desktop (just somes tricks, but incredibly convenient). Fully configurable

optionsEnableBigComment.message: Auto-resize comment (discussion, MP) fields on user text.

optionsEnableAlinea.message: Set text indentation on all paragraphe begins:

optionsEnableLocalStorageGestion.message: Enable comments and notifications reload button

popupHelpFirst.message: First: What is your issue? Are you perfectly sure that the extension must really do what you expected ? To be sure, please check the complete functionality description

popupHelpSecond.message: Second: Did you check the option page ? Are you sure that the missing functionality is actually activated ? Please check your options before sending us a report.

popupHelpThird.message: Third: Most issues can simply be solved with a page refreshing... Please try to refresh:

popupHelpLast.message: If you still see an issue, please report to us on this particular page (in english or in french, please).

popupNotWorkingContent.message: This extension only works on Wattpad Website, please go to wattpad before :)

popupFooterBugAndFeature.message: Request a feature or report bug

popupFooterDisclamer.message: This is an unofficial wattpad extension, I do it to improve my wattpad experience... and yours. Please enjoy-it :)
